title: Microservices Architecture
prompt:
Design a microservices architecture for [SYSTEM]:

Requirements: [LIST REQUIREMENTS]

Provide:
1. Service decomposition and boundaries
2. Architecture diagram
3. Communication patterns (REST, gRPC, messaging)
4. Data management strategy
5. Service discovery and load balancing
6. Resilience patterns (circuit breaker, retry)
7. Security (OAuth2, JWT)
8. Observability (tracing, logging, metrics)
9. Deployment (Docker, Kubernetes)
10. Scalability strategy
11. Technology stack recommendations
